name: Sweet Pure CBD
description: Sweet Pure CBD by Sweet Seeds is a CBD-dominant cross of undisclosed genetics. Descending from a pollinated clone of the Diesel family, Sweet Pure CBD generates between 8-15% CBD and 1% or less of THC, making it a good medicine for cannabis consumers seeking relaxing, clear-headed effects. This strain’s aroma has been described as sweet and fruity, expressing notes of Cypress and Mandarin oranges.
